title: Pixel 3 XL and Android Auto - weird display gltiches
content:
Pixel 3 XL / Smart 453 with Tomtom Media System
When connecting the Pixel 3 XL to a Smart 453s Media System, the Android Auto app on the car's display has weird glitches. 
Also, the connection gets lost when switching to Maps (Satellite View).
It almost seems as if bandwith is to narrow.

I've tried this with to different Smart cars, different USB-Cables. 
Everything works fine with my old Nexus 6p.

Everything is updated to the latest software available.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
